text: Dragan Samardžić (5 October 1946 – 28 November 2022) was a Yugoslavian association football player who played as a goalkeeper. Until 1976 Samardžić was goalkeeper at Rad Belgrad. In 1976 he was signed by the Dutch club Willem II. He played for the club between 1976 and 1980. He played 140 matches in four years, including 49 matches in which the opponents didn't score. He played 94 matches in the Eerste Divisie and 46 matches in the Eredivisie. After his career he worked as an advisor to the mayor of Novi Sad in 2014. Until 2022, Samardzic was chairman of football club SD Vojvodina. Samardžić died on 28 November 2022, at the age of 76. ==References== Category:Yugoslavian footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths
title: Dragan Samardžić
